verses.verse: Put In Remembrance <S%G5279><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> To Rulers <S%G746><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Authorities <S%G1849><s%> To Be Subject, <S%G5293><s%> To Be Obedient, <S%G3980><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> Ready <S%G2092><s%> To Be, <S%G1511><s%>

No One <S%G3367><s%> To Speak Evil Of, <S%G987><s%> Not Contentious <S%G269><s%> To Be, To Be <S%G1511><s%> Gentle, <S%G1933><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Shewing <S%G1731><s%> Meekness <S%G4236><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Men. <S%G444><s%>

<S%G1510><s%> For Were <S%G1063><s%> Once <S%G4218><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Without Intelligence, <S%G453><s%> Disobedient, <S%G545><s%> Led Astray, <S%G4105><s%> Serving <S%G1398><s%> Lusts <S%G1939><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pleasures <S%G2237><s%> Various, <S%G4164><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Malice <S%G2549><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Envy <S%G5355><s%> Living, <S%G1236><s%> Hateful, <S%G4767><s%> Hating <S%G3404><s%> One Another. <S%G240><s%>

<S%G3753><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kindness <S%G5544><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Love To Man <S%G5363><s%> Appeared <S%G2014><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4990><s%> Of Our Saviour <S%G2257><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Which Were <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Practised <S%G4160><s%> We, <S%G2249><s%> But <S%G235><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846><s%> His Mercy <S%G1656><s%> He Saved <S%G4982><s%> Us, <S%G2248><s%> Through The <S%G1223><s%> Washing <S%G3067><s%> Of Regeneration <S%G3824><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Renewing <S%G342><s%> Of The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> He Poured Out <S%G1632><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Richly <S%G4146><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4990><s%> Our Saviour; <S%G2257><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> Having Been Justified <S%G1344><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1565><s%> By His Grace, <S%G5485><s%> Heirs <S%G2818><s%> We Should Become <S%G1096><s%> ' According To The <S%G2596><s%> Hope <S%G1680><s%> Of Life <S%G2222><s%> Eternal. <S%G166><s%>

Faithful Is <S%G4103><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> These Things <S%G5130><s%> I Desire <S%G1014><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> To Affirm Strongly, <S%G1226><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> May Take Care <S%G5431><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Works To <S%G2041><s%> Be Forward In <S%G4291><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Have Believed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Are <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Profitable <S%G5624><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Men; <S%G444><s%>

<S%G3474><s%> But Foolish <S%G1161><s%> Questions <S%G2214><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Genealogies <S%G1076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Strifes <S%G2054><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Contentions <S%G3163><s%> About The Law <S%G3544><s%> Stand Aloof From; <S%G4026><s%> They Are <S%G1526><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Unprofitable <S%G512><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Vain. <S%G3152><s%>
A Sectarian <S%G141><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> <S%G1520><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Second <S%G1208><s%> Admonition <S%G3559><s%> Reject, <S%G3868><s%>
Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Is Perverted <S%G1612><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Such A One, <S%G5108><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sins, <S%G264><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> Self Condemned. <S%G843><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> I Shall Send <S%G3992><s%> Artemas <S%G734><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Tychicus, <S%G5190><s%> Be Diligent <S%G4704><s%> To Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Nicopolis; <S%G3533><s%> <S%G1563><s%> For There <S%G1063><s%> I Have Decided <S%G2919><s%> To Winter. <S%G3914><s%>

Zenas <S%G2211><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lawyer <S%G3544><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Apollos <S%G625><s%> Diligently <S%G4709><s%> Set Forward, <S%G4311><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Nothing <S%G3367><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> May Be Lacking; <S%G3007><s%>

Let Learn <S%G3129><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ours <S%G2251><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> To Be Forward In <S%G4291><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Necessary <S%G316><s%> Wants, <S%G5532><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> They May Not Be <S%G5600><s%> Unfruitful. <S%G175><s%>

Salute <S%G782><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> All. <S%G3956><s%> Salute <S%G782><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G5368><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Faith. <S%G4102><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Grace Be <S%G5485><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> You. <S%G5216><s%> . Amen. <S%G281><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Of The Creationist <S%G2912><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Overseer <S%G1985><s%> Chosen. <S%G5500><s%> Written <S%G1125><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Nicopolis <S%G3533><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Macedonia. <S%G3109><s%>
